messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

vulnerabilities to fix on several servers sent monday march vulnerabilities fix several servers hi guys sd please open ticket for several servers have identified having vulnerabilities attached you ll find report outdated server software end appears have outdated software installed port please update latest version bind please update bind please update apache please update apache apache apache process migration please update apache apache school please update apache apache port please update apache apache maintenance process migration please update apache apache process migration please update apache apache process migration please update apache apache please update apache possibly thank you technical consultant ext your zone

I need to make sure I pick the most appropriate one, and will provide an update when I have made my decision.
